title: Multiple Choice Quiz Test
description: A quiz with both single and multiple choice questions

questions.question: Which of these are primary colors? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: The primary colors in the additive color model (light) are red, green, and blue. In the subtractive color model (pigments), they are cyan, magenta, and yellow.

questions.question: Which of these programming languages are statically typed? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: TypeScript and Java are statically typed languages, meaning type checking is done at compile time.

questions.question: What is the capital city of Canada?
questions.explanation: Ottawa is the capital city of Canada, not Toronto which is the largest city.
